name: BilliARds - AR Pool Table
description:
Have you ever wanted to be able to carry an entire pool table with you wherever you go?

Have you ever tried playing Billiards with a golf club, only to be kicked out of the pool hall?

Do you insist on throwing a handful of confetti in the air every time you pocket a ball?

Have you ever brought a baseball bat to a pool cue fight?

Well look no further! Your pool playing needs have been met forever with BilliARds!

--Realistic Billiards Physics--
Put spin on the ball by hitting it off center, balls bounce with realistic weight and move just as you would expect them to in real life! Control the power of your stroke by tapping and dragging on your device!

--Play Anywhere--
Using the power of Augmented Reality you can place the AR Pool Table anywhere you want! Play on the bus, in your house, in your friends house, or outside! If you have to stop or go somewhere else, simply recalibrate the table in your new location and keep playing!

--Unlock Different Cosmetic Items--
Scoring balls and completing a game will earn you in game stars. Spend these stars on different pool cue's and tables! Do you prefer a sleek looking cue or a 9 iron?

--Play Your Way--
Additional game modes will be coming in a future update, but for now the table works just like it would in real life. If you have your own game mode you like to play with friends, don't worry! You can play however you like in BilliARds - AR Pool Table!

Music from www.zapsplat.com
